Police_Onceki_No.description: Previous policy number from ÖNCEKİ POLİÇE NO field

Police_Baslangic_Tarihi.description: Policy start date after Risk No 1 and Tanzim date

Police_Bitis_Tarihi.description: Policy end date after start date in header table

Sigortali_Adi.description: Customer name between Sigortalı and Sigortalı Adresi

Sigortali_Adresi.description: Customer address after Sigortalı Adresi label

SBM_Tramer_Belge_No.description: Tramer document number from TRAMER BELGE NO field

SBM_Bim_Reference_No.description: BIM reference number from REF NO field

Arac_Plaka_No.description: Turkish license plate format after PLAKA field

Arac_Marka_Tip.description: Vehicle brand and model from TİP field

Arac_Model.description: Vehicle model name (first part of TİP field)

Arac_Model_Yili.description: Vehicle model year from MODEL field

Arac_Kullanim_Sekli.description: Vehicle usage type from KULLANIM TARZI field

Arac_Marka_Kodu.description: Vehicle brand code from MARKA field

Teminat_IMM_Bedeni_Maddi_Ayrimsiz_Bedeli.description: Bodily and material damages coverage amount

Teminat_IMM_Manevi_Tazminat_Bedeli.description: Manevi damages coverage percentage of IMM limit

Teminat_Ikame_Arac.description: Replacement vehicle service terms. MAPFRE provides detailed service descriptions with dual track system: contracted repair centers (7-14 days) vs non-contracted services (5-7 days) with variable durations, or exclusion statement. Multi-pattern approach captures comprehensive business terms or exclusion cases.

Teminat_Yedek_Parca.description: Parts policy: original or equivalent parts

Teminat_Hasar_Kademesi_Bilgisi.description: No-claims discount level number (0-5) from header HASARSIZLIK field. MAPFRE extracts the step level as required by FIELD_PATTERNS_GUIDE.md standardization.
